drivers: Risk regime is balanced: neither strong risk-on nor risk-off dominance.

outlook.baseCase: Balanced regime; keep allocations within neutral ranges.
outlook.upsideTrigger: Risk-on tilt if SPY/QQQ hold above MA200.
outlook.downsideTrigger: Defensive shift if bond stress persists or trend breaks.

responsePlan: Stay within the neutral allocation band.
Rebalance only if regime changes, not on noise.
Track trend + bond stress for confirmation.
